mapper.insert: insert into tbl_mygroup (emp_no, reg_user) values ((select emp_no from tbl_emp where username = #{username}), (select emp_name from tbl_emp where username = #{username})) ;
mapper.update: update tbl_mygroup set mygroup_name = #{mygroupName} , mod_user = (select emp_name from tbl_emp where username = #{username}) , mod_date = now() where emp_no = (select emp_no from tbl_emp where username = #{username}) ;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_favorite (mygroup_no, favorite_emp_no, reg_user) values ((select mygroup_no from tbl_mygroup join tbl_emp te on te.emp_no = tbl_mygroup.emp_no where username = #{username}), (select emp_no from tbl_emp where emp_no = #{empNo}) , (select emp_name from tbl_emp where username = #{username})) ;
mapper.delete: delete f from tbl_favorite as f left join tbl_mygroup tm on f.mygroup_no = tm.mygroup_no where f.mygroup_no = #{mygroupNo}
mapper.select: select te.emp_name, tem.emp_rank, te.username, te.emp_phone, from tbl_favorite join tbl_mygroup tm on tm.mygroup_no = tbl_favorite.mygroup_no join tbl_emp te on tbl_favorite.favorite_emp_no = te.emp_no join tbl_emp_mapping tem on te.emp_no = tem.emp_no where tbl_favorite.mygroup_no = #{mygroupNo} ;

select te.emp_name, tem.emp_rank, te.username, te.emp_phone, te.email from tbl_favorite join tbl_mygroup tm on tbl_favorite.mygroup_no = tm.mygroup_no join tbl_emp te on te.emp_no = tbl_favorite.favorite_emp_no join tbl_emp_mapping tem on te.emp_no = tem.emp_no where tm.mygroup_no = ${mygroupNo} and te.emp_no = ${empNo} ;
